sourcesContent:
<template>
    <select @change="changeLanguage" :value="$i18n.locale">
      <option value="en">English</option>
      <option value="nl">Nederlands</option>
    </select>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  export default {
    name: 'LanguageSwitcher',
    mounted() {
      // Ensure 'en' is set as the initial language
      this.$i18n.changeLanguage('en')
    },
    methods: {
      changeLanguage(event) {
        this.$i18n.changeLanguage(event.target.value)
      }
    }
  }
  </script>
